email.description: The person's email address (should be realistic).

phone.description: The person's phone number as a string.

address.description: The person's address information. While not all address attributes are mandatory, a general rule for an address to be valid is: must have non empty streetName AND (streetNumber OR building OR poBox) AND city AND postalCode AND country

streetNumber.description: Street number as a string. Can be empty.

streetName.description: Street name as a string. Mandatory.

apartment.description: Apartment number as a string. Can be empty.

building.description: Building name or number as a string. Can be empty.

poBox.description: PO box as a string. Can be empty.

city.description: City name as a string. Mandatory.

region.description: Region or state as a string. Can be empty.

postalCode.description: Postal code as a string. Mandatory

country.description: Country name as a string. Mandatory.

personSkills.description: Array of skills for the person. 5 to 15 skills, coherent with **jobTitle**

items.description: A skill object representing a specific skill the person has, with years of experience and level reached.

yearsOfXP.description: Number of years of experience for the skill.

jobTitle.description: Job title as a string. A plausible jobTitle for this person, given the skills he/she has, years of experience and level for each skill taken into account

notes.description: HR notes as a string (optional, ~10% of employees, leave empty for ~90% of employees).

billingRate.description: Daily billing rate as an integer (250-2000).
